qas.question: How many guest rooms does the Sheraton have?
How many suites does the Sheraton have?
How many rooms does The Radisson Montevideo have?

context: Montevideo has over 50 hotels, mostly located within the downtown area or along the beachfront of the Rambla de Montevideo. Many of the hotels are in the modern, western style, such as the Sheraton Montevideo, the Radisson Montevideo Victoria Plaza Hotel located on the central Plaza Independencia, and the Plaza Fuerte Hotel on the waterfront. The Sheraton has <a0_0>207<a0_0/> guest rooms and <a1_0>10<a1_0/> suites and is luxuriously furnished with imported furniture. The Radisson Montevideo has <a2_0>232<a2_0/> rooms and contains a casino and is served by the Restaurante Arcadia.
